description:
Sinar Resmi Kasepuhan

Kasepuhan Sinar Resmi, led by Abah Asep Nugraha, is located in Cisolok District and is a variation of one of Kasepuhan Banten Kidul's traditional villages that has been preserved. Kasepuhan Sinar Resmi is an important feature of the Ciletuh Geopark's cultural character.

In the agricultural sector, the Kasepuhan Sinar Resmi community still follows the traditions of their forefathers. From the time rice is planted to the time it is harvested in this traditional community, agricultural celebrations are constantly present. The Seren Taun, which is held to celebrate the rice harvest and is generally filled with tourists, is the most famous ceremony.

I took this photo at 2018
